mapper.select: select a.no, a.member_no as memberNo, a.brand_no as brandNo, a.title, a.classification, a.amount, a.duetime, a.type, a.useddate, b.name as brandname, b.engname as brandengname from coupon a join brand b on a.brand_no = b.no where member_no = #{no}

select b.no as productNo, b.name as name, b.price as productPrice, b.thumbnail as thumbnail, b.views as views, c.name as brandname, c.engname as brandengname from zzim a JOIN product b on a.product_no = b.no JOIN brand c on b.brand_no = c.no where a.member_no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation values(reservation_id_seq.nextval, #{brandNo}, #{memberNo}, TO_DATE(#{restime}, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'), 0, #{memo}, 0, #{storeNo})
